name: Quarantined!
description:
Quarantined! is a little arcade game in wich you fight Coronavirus (yes, that one) and some other enemies as Italian people (the dumb people that went outside while quarantined) and Boomers too. Enjoy the best composition ever composed by Dvorak, mixed with my personally voiced sound!
You play as Trump, and you have access to power ups that help the fight against this disease.

 The goal is to survive as much as possible without getting your population to zero.

The game is in alpha state and is under active development. Critiques are appreciated if useful, i have a lot to add to the game such as Bosses, power ups, skins AND special effect etc etc.

A special thank to Godot and Krita developers.
A special thank to Dvorak, who composed the masterpiece I used as soundtrack.
But MOST important thanks to everyone who take its time to download this little little game.
